snippet: For President Obama, the Democratic National Convention captured his tricky balancing act: a four-year struggle to show that pro-worker does not mean antibusiness.
abstract: Democratic National Convention captured the tricky balancing act that Pres Obama will have to pull off with respect to jobs, by avoiding being tarred as anti-business by Republicans while still managing to stand up for workers.
lead_paragraph: For President Obama, the Democratic National Convention captured his tricky balancing act: a four-year struggle to show that pro-worker does not mean antibusiness.

headline.seo: Democrats Juggle a Mixed Message on Economy
headline.main: Democrats Face a Juggling Act Over Economy Message
headline.print_headline: Democrats Face a Juggling Act Over Jobs
